category: About the Gender DEI Toolkit Volume III

content.text: The MARC team is extremely grateful to the following organization for their contribution in Volumes I, II, and/or Volume III (in alphabetical order): Abacus, ASK Development, Bank Alfalah, Bank of Punjab, Bestway Cement, British Council, Careem, Engro Polymers and Chemicals Limited, Fauji Fertilizer Company Limited, Feroze1888, FINCA Microfinance Bank Limited, Hashoo Group, HR Business Solutions, HRSG, Interloop, Jazz, JS Bank, Mobilink Microfinance Bank Limited, Nayatel, PPAF, PTCL, S&P Global, Shell, Siemens, Telenor, Teradata, The Change Factory, TPL Corporation, Transworld Associates, Unilever, Women Technology House, and others who chose to remain anonymous.

The team also extends its appreciation to the creator of the animated videos, Aneeqa Mehboob, for her endless hours of work in creating the video. The team also appreciates the work of Muhammad Faizan Rauf and his team for the voice overs of all the videos. The scripts of all the videos, whether adapted or original, were written by the Volume III team.
